org.opends.sdk.controls
Class ServerSideSortControl.Request

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.controls.Control
      org.opends.sdk.controls.ServerSideSortControl.Request
Enclosing class:
ServerSideSortControl
public static class ServerSideSortControl.Request
extends Control

This class implements the server-side sort request control as defined in RFC 2891 section 1.1. The ASN.1 description for the control value is: 

 SortKeyList ::= SEQUENCE OF SEQUENCE {
            attributeType   AttributeDescription,
            orderingRule    [0] MatchingRuleId OPTIONAL,
            reverseOrder    [1] BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE }
